Trade/Device Name(s): Element V Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Element M V Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Element V Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood using electrochemical technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various body sites for single patient home use as an aid to monitor the effectiveness of diabetes control, not for diagnosis or screening or neonatal use
